mapper.select: SELECT data_1000cd as code , concat(x1, ',', y1, ' ', x2, ',', y1, ' ', x2, ',', y2, ' ', x1, ',', y2, ' ', x1, ',', y1) as area FROM ( SELECT data_1000cd, MIN(data_left) x1, MAX(data_right) x2, MAX(data_top) y1, MIN(data_bottom) y2 FROM "datahubUpgrade".grid_dat GROUP BY data_1000cd ) a
